pages.text: Deuterium is an isotope of $(l:gas/hydrogen)Hydrogen$(/l) with an extra neutron, used in a $(l:multiblocks/fusion_reactor)Fusion Reactor$(/l).
It is made by putting heavy water in an $(l:block/electrolytic_separator)Electrolytic Separator$(/l), which also produces $(l:gas/oxygen)oxygen$(/l)

Deuterium and $(l:chemicals/tritium)Tritium$(/l) can be either injected straight into a reactor, or combined in a $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) to create $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l)
